full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYIS BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA CIG @008A *, ,GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYIS BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BRTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA CIG BYAS PA MANG PO YOD PA DANG CHOS RGYAL KYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYED PA DANG SANG MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GAS BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GIS RIMS 'GROGS DGOS CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I DO MCHOG GAR RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PE SRID SNYAM PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BYANG CHUB SE SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG LA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG RKUN LA RTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
